Detailed Description

template<typename PACKETS, uint8_t * BASE, FieldFlags FLAGS, size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096>
class proto::DataFieldPrototype< PACKETS, BASE, FLAGS, MAX_SIZE >

Field prototype representing a DATA field that can contain one of multiple packet types selected by ID.

Template Parameters
PACKETSstd::tuple of PacketInfo entries describing available payloads.
BASEBase pointer to shared buffer.
FLAGSField flags.
MAX_SIZEMaximum size in bytes (applies to pointer payloads).

Member Function Documentation

◆ get_copy()

template<typename PACKETS, uint8_t * BASE, FieldFlags FLAGS, size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096>
auto proto::DataFieldPrototype< PACKETS, BASE, FLAGS, MAX_SIZE >::get_copy ( ) const -> FieldType
inline

Get current value as std::variant (copy).

  • Returns std::monostate if no ID is set or ID not found.
  • Returns value of type T (copy for fixed-size types, pointer for pointer payloads).
  • EmptyDataType â†’ std::monostate.
Returns
Variant holding current value.
